amendment.description: An amendment numbered 14 printed in Part B of House Report 116-383 to add the term "homelessness" (as defined by the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development) as an unusual extenuating life circumstance or event that results in severe financial or personal barriers and demonstrates undue hardship.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 14 printed in Part B of House Report 116-383 to add the term "homelessness" (as defined by the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development) as an unusual extenuating life circumstance or event that results in severe financial or personal barriers and demonstrates undue hardship.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Panetta amendment (A014) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A014) offered by Mr. Panetta.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Panetta amendment (A014) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
